body: Find out more about the content of the Kentico MVC - Essentials module

body: Find out about what it means to develop Kentico websites in MVC development model and how Kentico API works.

title: Kentico MVC | Development basics

body: Find out how the administration interface stores data and how you can create your own page types.

title: Creating page types

body: Find out how you can set up your website to support multiple cultures.
pageBody: Find out how you can set up your website to support multiple cultures.
title: Creating a multicultural website

body: Find out how to set up route templates and page URLs for Kentico MVC websites, and how to serve requests for multilingual content.
pageBody: Find out how to set up route templates and page URLs for Kentico MVC websites, and how to serve requests for multilingual content.
title: Routing and URLs

body: Find out how you can retrieve data from Kentico and display it on the live site.
pageBody: Find out how you can retrieve data from Kentico and display it on the live site.

body: Put the knowledge gained in the previous page into practice.

body: Find out how you can display the localized resource strings and create content approval workflow

body: Find out how you can prepare the applications so content editors can dynamically add content to their navigation menu.

title: Kentico MVC | Creating a navigation menu

body: See how you can add and display media files on your website.

body: The content of your website is ready. Find out how you can optimize your websites performance - and what to take care of when preparing the website for deployment.
